name: AS3_Shmup
description:
- WASD to move the character

- SPACE to shoot the enemies

The sprites of the player were created based on the mecha KYRIOS in the animation Mobile Suit Gundam 00. KYRIOS has a transformation mechanism to switch between “Flight Mode” and “MS Mode”. In the game, I used the switching sprite function. When the player gets 600 points by shooting the enemies, the Fighter aircraft form will turn to the Gundam. There are four waves of enemies in total. If the player gets hit by 5 times, the game is over.

Music: Waterflame - Space Chase [Animation Score]
